Base Case Analysis
The results of the base-case analysis are shown in Table 2. For all paroxysmal or persistent patients with AF, in comparison with amiodarone and sotalol, dronedarone was expected to gain additional 1.28 QALYs (5.15 vs 3.87) and 1.78 QALYs (5.15 vs 3.37) over a lifetime horizon, with higher costs of $6632 ($11,025 vs $4393) and $6278 ($11,025 vs $4748), respectively.
